markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Daemon Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1387) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 40 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Grimspawn](/Feats.aspx?ID=1380)

</column>

---

The magic of Abaddon runs through your blood, and you can wield that power. You can cast [_death knell_](/Spells.aspx?ID=63) and [_false life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=108) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Daemon Magic
